name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Software Essentialist: Scroll To Title

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In The Software Essentialist web course, automatically scroll to the current title in the sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using The Software Essentialist web course, this extension will automatically scroll the navigation sidebar to the currently viewed title.
